Erfan Jafar

Resume

About Me

Hi, I’m Erfan Jafar, a passionate Software Engineer based in St. John’s, NL, with a strong background in software development, system troubleshooting, and data analysis. I am currently pursuing a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science, with a minor in Business Administration at Memorial University of Newfoundland, and will graduate in December 2024.

Experience

Innovmarine

Junior Programmer Analyst Intern | January 2023 - September 2023

  • Collaborated on a cross-functional team to create a SAAS web application using JavaScript, C#, Razor, Bootstrap, and HTML.
  • Conducted code reviews, thorough testing, ensuring adherence to best practices, functionality, quality, and user satisfaction.
  • Managed SQL databases, optimizing schema design and performance, identified and resolved software bugs.
  • Contributed to comprehensive documentation for ETL softwares, web applications, and database processes.
  • Developed VBA and PowerQuery ETL transformations, enhancing data quality.
  • Used PowerBI for data visualization and building relations between tables from SQL servers.
C# JavaScript Razor Bootstrap HTML PowerBI MySQL PowerQuery

GeekSquad

In-store and In-home Computer Technician | October 2021 - Present

  • Diagnosed and resolved technical issues on laptops, desktops, and mobile devices, ensuring efficient service with an average 95% customer satisfaction rate.
  • Performed hardware repairs including hard drive replacements, RAM upgrades, and screen repairs, reducing service turnaround times by 20%.
  • Recommended appropriate technology solutions based on customer needs, contributing to an increase in sales of extended warranties and service plans by 10%.
  • Conducted home theater installations, including mounting TVs, setting up sound systems, and integrating smart home technologies for seamless entertainment experiences.
  • Managed multiple service appointments per day, adhering to strict schedules while maintaining high levels of service quality and professionalism.
System Diagnostics Incident Resolution Problem Solving Time Management Client Relationship Scheduling

Beef & Butter

Junior IT Specialist | March 2021 - August 2021

  • Seamlessly integrated restaurant profiles with delivery apps, ensuring accurate menu information and pricing.
  • Revamped website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, elevating online presence and user experience.
  • Collaborated with stakeholders for effective integration and documented technical changes.
